text: Hello and welcome to the Food Revolution.
I'm Jamie Oliver, a chef and campaigner from Britain.

I think it's crazy that we live in
a world where millions of children get too
much of the wrong food, while millions more get too little good food. There are 41 million children

under the age of 5 that are currently over-weight
or obese. While 159 million under 5's are stunted.

It exists in every single country in the world.
Obesity and hunger living side by side. Please

join the food revolution and let's put an
end to obesity and under nourishment the world over.
